Didier Willis has suggested that iôr is a noun.Didier Willis
p. 400: http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html Hiswelókës Sindarin Dictionary at http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com (accessed 19 June 2011)

David Salo has suggested that the form ŷr (retaining the same meaning) could be valid Neo-Elvish.
